gameDetails.name: Marvel Champions: The Card Game â€“ Psylocke Hero Pack
gameDetails.description:
A powerful telepath and skilled martial artist, Psylocke’s psionic knives can cleave her enemies’ minds as easily as her katanas cut through their armor. As a member of both X-Force and the X-Men, she is willing to go to any lengths—and would even lay down her life—for her team. Now, Psylocke powers her way into your games of Marvel Champions: The Card Game! By switching between her Psi-Knives and Psi-Katantas, Psylocke can boost her ATK or THW stats to fit her needs, giving her unparalleled versatility. Within this Hero Pack, you will find Psylocke, her seventeen signature cards, and a full assortment of Justice cards inviting you to thwart the villains’ schemes.

—description from the publisher
